    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void findBest​(double[] grades, int totalMarks)
      This method creates a new array _letterGrades using the totalMarks, a counter and by going through the previously sorted array reverses it and takes the largest value to return to the user
      void findDeviation​(double[] grades)
      This method finds the sample standard deviation for the marks input by subtracting the mean from each score squaring the result, adding the result to the previously calculated score, then square rooting the final calculation by total - 1
      void findMean​(double[] grades)
      This method finds the mean of all the grades from the student array from the TestScores class, it adds them all up and divides by the total.
      double getDeviation()
      This method gets the deviation for the student set marks
      double getMean()
      This method returns the mean
      double[] inputGrades​(double[] student, int totalMarks, java.util.Scanner input)
      This method asks the user for input to populate the student array for TestScores, uses scanner object input and totalMarks to set the bounds of the array
      void outputResult()
      This method calculates the best scores and creates a bell curve based on them.
      void setDeviation​(double _deviation)
      this method sets the deviation to _deviation
      void setMean​(double _mean)
      This method sets _mean
      void sortingScores​(double[] student)
      This method takes the student array and sorts it from lowest to highest
      void studentMatrix​(int preDefined, java.util.Scanner input, java.security.SecureRandom random)

      • findBest

        public void findBest​(double[] grades,
                     int totalMarks)
        This method creates a new array _letterGrades using the totalMarks, a counter and by going through the previously sorted array reverses it and takes the largest value to return to the user
        Parameters:
        grades - holds the student array from TestScorse class
        totalMarks - holds the totalMarks from the TestScores class

      • findMean

        public void findMean​(double[] grades)
        This method finds the mean of all the grades from the student array from the TestScores class, it adds them all up and divides by the total.
        Parameters:
        grades - holds the student array from testScores

      • findDeviation

        public void findDeviation​(double[] grades)
        This method finds the sample standard deviation for the marks input by subtracting the mean from each score squaring the result, adding the result to the previously calculated score, then square rooting the final calculation by total - 1
        Parameters:
        grades - holds the student array from TestScores class

      • inputGrades

        public double[] inputGrades​(double[] student,
                            int totalMarks,
                            java.util.Scanner input)
        This method asks the user for input to populate the student array for TestScores, uses scanner object input and totalMarks to set the bounds of the array
        Parameters:
        student - holds the student array fromTestScores
        totalMarks - holds the totalMarks from user for size of new student array
        input - Scanner object from TestScores, used for user input1
        Returns:
        returns the student array to TestScores
